name: Airgle
overview:
Airgle manufactures advanced air purification systems.

Airgle has mastered the art of air purification, creating systems that fuse high performance with modern design. As industry pioneers, we pride ourselves on innovation and unsurpassed quality. An Airgle air purifier doesn’t just help you breathe better: it offers peace of mind.

Our most popular and affordable system for allergy and asthma suffers, the PurePal air purifier (AG800) features 50 sq ft of HEPAfast media and 3 lbs of premium carbon. The PurePal’s proven ability to effectively remove a large variety of particulate and molecular air pollutants makes it our most popular general-purpose air purifier. In an independent test performed by the Association of Home Appliance Manufacturers (AHAM), the PurePal achieved CADR ratings that are among the highest in the industry. Tobacco Smoke > 450 Pollen > 450 Dust > 400
